about.title: About PR TEC Academy
about.subtitle: We prepare the next generation of programmers
about.description: PR TEC Academy was founded in 2023, and quickly became at the forefront of programming education by providing comprehensive courses that connect the academic side with job market requirements.
about.mission: Our mission is simple: to provide high-quality programming education for everyone regardless of background or previous experience. We believe that anyone can become an outstanding programmer with the right guidance and practical training.
about.vision: From children taking their first steps in programming to professionals seeking to develop their skills, we provide a supportive learning environment that encourages creativity, problem-solving, and technical excellence.

children.title: Coding for Kids
children.subtitle: Fun and Interactive Programming Courses for Children

whatsapp.message: Hello! I'm interested in learning more about PR TEC Academy courses. Can you help me?
whatsapp.courseMessage: Hi! I'd like to know more about the {{courseName}} course. Can you provide more details?

flutter.title: Flutter App Development
flutter.description: Learn how to build exceptional, high-performance apps for Android and iOS using Flutter and Dart.
features: Dart fundamentals & Object-Oriented Programming
Flutter widgets, layouts, and responsive UI patterns
State management (Provider, Bloc, Riverpod) and Clean Architecture
REST API integration (Dio/HTTP), error handling, and caching
Firebase suite: Auth, Firestore, Storage, Cloud Functions, FCM
Supabase integration (auth, storage, realtime databases)
Payment gateways (Stripe, Paymob, etc.) and in-app purchases
Deploying to Play Store & App Store, versioning, and CI/CD basics
Using AI tools to speed up development and boost your project portfolio

frontend.title: Frontend Web Development
frontend.description: Master the skills to create interactive and modern websites using the latest technologies.
features: HTML5 semantic structure & accessibility basics
CSS3, responsive design, Flexbox/Grid, and Tailwind CSS
Modern JavaScript (ES6+), DOM manipulation, and async patterns
React fundamentals, Hooks, and React Router for SPA navigation
State management (Context API, Redux Toolkit) and global stores
API integration (Axios/Fetch), error handling, and data caching
Tooling & bundlers (Vite/Webpack) and environment variables
Testing with Jest & React Testing Library and deployment (Vercel/Netlify)
Using AI to accelerate UI development, prototyping, and debugging

python.title: Python Backend Development
python.description: Build powerful server systems using Python, Django, and modern databases.
features: Python syntax, OOP, virtual environments, and best practices
Django MVC pattern, templates, and ORM fundamentals
Django REST Framework (DRF) for building secure RESTful APIs
PostgreSQL integration, migrations, and advanced queries
Authentication & authorization (JWT/OAuth), permissions, and throttling
Task queues & scheduling with Celery and Redis
Dockerizing your backend and deploying to cloud platforms (Heroku/AWS)
Automated testing (pytest) and CI/CD pipelines
Leveraging AI for code generation, documentation, and backend automation

csharp.title: C# Backend Development
csharp.description: Develop applications and APIs using .NET Core and Microsoft technologies.
features: C# fundamentals, OOP, and .NET runtime essentials
ASP.NET Core MVC and building RESTful Web APIs
Entity Framework Core, LINQ, and database migrations
SQL Server integration, schema design, and stored procedures
Authentication & authorization with Identity and JWT tokens
Dependency Injection, Clean Architecture, and SOLID principles
Docker containers, Azure deployment, and IIS hosting basics
Logging, monitoring, and debugging production issues
AI integration (Azure Cognitive Services, OpenAI APIs) to enhance your apps

basics.title: Programming Fundamentals
basics.description: Build a strong foundation in programming using C++ and computer science concepts.
features: C++ syntax, variables, data types, and standard input/output
Control flow (conditions, loops) and error handling basics
Functions, modularization, and Object-Oriented Programming concepts
Data structures (Arrays, Linked Lists, Stacks, Queues, Trees)
Algorithms (sorting, searching, recursion) and complexity analysis
Debugging strategies, IDE usage, and code optimization tips
Introduction to databases (SQL basics and ERD diagrams)
Version control with Git/GitHub and collaborative workflows
How to leverage AI tools to practice, debug, and improve your solutions

kids.title: Kids Programming
kids.description: An interactive programming journey for kids using Scratch and simplified Python.
features: Scratch basics: drag-and-drop coding and game logic for kids
Designing simple games and interactive stories
Intro to Python through fun mini-projects and visual examples
Logical thinking, problem-solving, and algorithmic reasoning
Creative challenges and weekly hands-on activities
Teamwork, communication, and presenting project ideas
Safe internet practices and digital citizenship
Showcasing projects to parents and earning badges/rewards
Simple AI concepts to inspire creativity and curiosity

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: What our students say about us

students.name: Sarah Abdullah
students.role: Web Designer at a Major Company
students.testimonial: Honestly, I didn't know anything about programming and always felt the field was too difficult for me. When I started the course with PR TEC, everything changed. The explanation was very simple, and each lesson had practical application. After finishing the course, I was able to work at a good company, and I'm very proud of myself.
students.outcome: Got hired 3 months after the course

students.name: Mohamed Kamal
students.testimonial: I was working in a job completely unrelated to technology and wanted to learn something with a future. I joined the Flutter course knowing nothing, but the way they teach made me love the field. Now I work freelance and create apps for people from home!
students.outcome: Built 3 apps and became a freelancer

students.name: Ahmed Fawzy
students.testimonial: This course literally changed my life. I thought Python and Django were difficult, but the curriculum was organized and the instructor knew what he was doing. They also helped me fix my CV and apply for jobs. Thank God, now my salary has increased and there are more opportunities.

students.name: Kareem Yasser
students.testimonial: I used to love games, but now I make games myself! The course is very fun, and I looked forward to the class every week. I made more than one game and showed them to my friends, and they were all amazed. I want to grow up and work as a game developer.
students.outcome: Created 5 games and now learning Python

students.name: Mai Khaled
students.testimonial: I'm 35 years old and thought I had missed the programming train. But when I started with PR TEC, I felt I was in an encouraging environment, and the instructor never delayed answering any question. Now I understand how to write code and thought about continuing and specializing.

students.name: Sherif Hassan
students.testimonial: I needed to create a first version of my app quickly, and I found nothing better than PR TEC. The courses are intensive and practical, and everything I need is available. It saved me a lot of time and I built the project myself.
students.outcome: Founded his company and raised $500K funding
